Question 40.Question: Please describe any differences in how it impacted your learning (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 40.Response: Impacted my learning by helping me realise mistakes a lot more earlier, helped immediately in times of uncertainties instead of waiting for teachers to respond, making GenAI more time efficient.

Question 41.Question: Were there any differences in how the feedback made you feel (comparing GenAI and your teacher)?
Question 41.Response: GenAI often identified the positives of my work through praise, which made me feel confident in what I use. The feedback was also very eye-opening as it often identified areas where I could structure my wording a little bit better compared to what I have said.

Question 42.Question: Describe any other differences between the feedback you received from GenAI and your teacher.
Question 42.Response: Differences: GenAI provides general feedback, whereas Teacher feedback is much more personalised and accurate due to professional knowledge in the content area.
